title: Inspecting the car

description: Episode number 2 of Series "How to Drive". Good driving depends on good habits and a quick daily inspection as well as regular maintenance of those items which directly affect safety is the first good habit to develop. Demonstrates a quick and easy method of checking items, by starting at the driver's door and walking anti-clockwise around the car.
